name: MeteorNY Meetup
tagline: MeteorJS Enthusiasts in the Greater New York City Area
body: ### Welcome This is the GitHub organization page for the MeteorNY Meetup, a regular meeting of MeteorJS enthusiasts in the Greater New York City Area. The goal of the organization is to support the development of distributed web applications using the MeteorJS platform by connecting people with diverse backgrounds (artists, designers, developers, entrepreneurs) and having collaborative and conversational efforts to improve our understanding and usage of this platform. ### About MeteorJS "Meteor is an open-source platform for building top-quality web apps in a fraction of the time, whether you're an expert developer or just getting started." To get started with learning Meteor, visit the MeteorJS Website or browse the community-maintained Meteorpedia to find a wealth of resources for self-study. ### About This Site This page was automatically generated by the GitHub GH-Pages Generator. To edit or modify the content please follow these instructions: ``` $ cd your_repo_root/repo_name $ git fetch origin $ git checkout gh-pages ``` ### Authors and Contributors The site is currently maintained by @nitya and @lifeinchords, co-organizers on the MeteorNY Meetup. We welcome contributions from the community and hope to extend this with a directory listing of members, projects and expertise to support spontaneous collaborations. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com for assistance.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
